numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that a higher income can increase a person's chances of admission.
2. I noticed that legacy status makes a huge difference in admission.
3. I wonder if other factors play a huge role in college admission.
4. Test scores are factors in college admission.
5. Grades are factors in college admission.
6. I wonder if there are factors apart from test scores and grades.
8. This gives me an idea of how I might compare to other applicants.
10. The headline is: What Colleges Actually Look For.
